synopsis.text: Given the chance to save Earth from an alien invasion, Ataru Moroboshi, a high school student known for his lecherous behavior and chronic bad luck, engages in a high-stakes game of tag against Lum, the captivating princess of the invading Oni race. Managing to secure victory through questionable means, Ataru believes his fortune has finally changed. However, Lum misinterprets his intentions and assumes he wants to marry her, leading her to not only invade Earth but also Ataru's love life. As he navigates the chaos of living with an alien fianc√©e and his true love, Ataru must find a way to balance his womanizing ways with the consequences of his unexpected victory in this otherworldly romantic comedy. Based on the manga by Rumiko Takahashi, this anime promises a thrilling and hilarious ride.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
